title: Bug 12428Pull Up: Confusing message
description: Bug 12428Pull Up: Confusing message Shouldn't it be 'Copy method 'void setUp()' FROM type 'TestCase'" (also with uppercase C in Copy). Another thing: if I select to delete setUp from TestCase, I get under TestCase the message "Delete method 'void setUp()' declared in type 'junit.framework.TestCase'. (Markus)
OB: When viewing the tree of changes, under the Assert section, a message is displayed as "copy method 'void setUp()' to type 'TestCase'." In this message, the TestCase is shown with the fully qualified name.
EB: The 'copy method' text should be consistent and also use the fully qualified name when displayed in the message.
SR: Ensure that the 'copy method' text consistently uses the fully qualified name when displaying the message.
